name: Diputs
description:
This game is a 3d platformer. 

Get the coins!

Unlock portal checkpoints!

Diputs is a 2d character illustrated and animated with Grease Pencil. 

3d modeling is 100% Blender. 

Game developed with UPBGE 3.0, Blender's Game Engine. 

The game saves when you collect a coin. 

Some debug information remains on screen for this render. 

This game is created by Eric Polley at ericpolley.com
